# BASCOM-AVR Documentation

> BASCOM-AVR is a BASIC compiler for Atmel AVR microcontrollers by MCS Electronics. It provides a high-level BASIC language for programming AVR chips with built-in support for LCD displays, I2C, SPI, 1-Wire, USB, CAN, and TCP/IP networking.

## Language Reference

### Commands
Language commands, statements, functions, and chip-specific documentation

- [$ASM](commands/asm.md)

## Libraries

### Lcd
Text and graphical LCD display libraries

- [$LCD](libraries/lcd/lcd_1.md)
- [$LCDPUTCTRL](libraries/lcd/lcdputctrl.md)
- [$LCDPUTDATA](libraries/lcd/lcdputdata.md)

- [$SERIALINPUT2LCD](libraries/lcd/serialinput2lcd.md)

- [DEFLCDCHAR](libraries/lcd/deflcdchar.md)
- [GLCD](libraries/lcd/glcd.md)
- [GLCDCMD](libraries/lcd/glcdcmd.md)
- [GLCDDATA](libraries/lcd/glcddata.md)

- [GLCDSED](libraries/lcd/glcdsed.md)
- [glcdSSD1325_96x64](libraries/lcd/glcdssd1325_96x64.md)
- [INITLCD](libraries/lcd/initlcd.md)
- [LCD](libraries/lcd/lcd_2.md)
- [LCD Commands](libraries/lcd/lcd_commands.md)
- [LCD RGB-8 Converter](libraries/lcd/lcdrgb_8converter.md)

- [LCD4BUSY](libraries/lcd/lcd4busy.md)
- [LCD4E2](libraries/lcd/lcd4e2.md)
- [LCD_RX1602A5](libraries/lcd/lcd_rx1602a5.md)
- [LCDAT](libraries/lcd/lcdat.md)
- [LCDAUTODIM](libraries/lcd/lcdautodim.md)
- [LCDCMD](libraries/lcd/lcdcmd.md)
